-----Original Message-----
From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu [mailto:countess_bathory_69@...]
Sent: October 29, 1999 10:21 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] LTR


From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>


LTR is the Lower Throne Room in Cazic Thule
UTR is the Upper Throne Room
AoF is where the Avatar of Fear spawns
Temple or Archon are the same spot..in the Temple at
the end of the maze.
Grid is a nasty little place with all boards that you
have to walk on, and tons of wandering lizzies that
will all jump on ya


>
> Thanx, I'm a newbie when it comes to Cazic, guess the LTR is still too
dangerous for me unless a 26 can get by there.
